name: .ABX File Extension
summary: Learn about .ABX files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: Address Book exported from WordPerfect Office, an all-in-one office suite developed by Corel; contains the contact information of contacts from the WordPerfect e-mail client; used to transfer a contacts list to a different device.

content: NOTE: ABX files were originally created in WordPerfect Mail which has now been integrated into the WordPerfect Office Suite.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
